evidence.claim: The company implements FHIR standards for interoperability in healthcare.
Healthcare Legal Solutions discusses their use of HL7 for data exchange protocols.
The company outlines their compliance with HIPAA regulations in handling patient data.
Discussion of EDI transactions (X12) in the context of healthcare payments and claims.
Cloud infrastructure is utilized for secure data management in compliance-driven environments.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of X12 transaction capabilities or clearinghouse services found on site.
